revised_title: A Study of Barometer, Thermometer, and Rain Records in Lyndon, Rutland, and Surrounding Areas
tldr: This article presents a detailed record of barometer, thermometer, and rain measurements taken in Lyndon, Rutland, and surrounding areas from 1784 to 1785. The author discusses the severe frost and weather conditions experienced during this period, as well as the impact on crops and plants. The data collected provides valuable insights into historical weather patterns and climate trends.
